thread.title: Kormac

author: Kormac
title: Kormac
text: My husband & I decided to search for a last minute booking for a short cruise. After surfing the net, I found cruisesalefinder.com & so started looking at what they were offering. I submitted an enquiry for a cruise that we had picked, that we thought would suit our needs, ie length of cruise, destination etc. I straight away received an email saying that I would be informed within 24hours if there was availability. Sure enough the next morning I received an email to say that we had been confirmed for the cruise on which we had enquired about. Details & information about the cruise were sent, how to print our E-ticket, how to confirm the booking through paying online etc were clear & easy to follow. Would highly recommend this company for their expertise & quality, & would definitely book through them again.
